install.name: Content - PopFeed
install.author: Christopher Mavros
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2010 Christopher Mavros. All rights reserved.
install.description: The simplest Plugin that popups a form to submit feedback.

param.name: auto_all
param.label: Auto PopFeed
param.description: This is an option to automatically include popfeed in every article. If this is No, to include PopFeed in an article you write {popfeed}Leave your Feedback (or whatever else text in here){/popfeed}

param.name: email_recipient
param.label: Email Recipient
param.description: The recipient of the feedback message.

param.name: from_name
param.label: Mail From Name
param.description: The name of the feedback message's sender

param.name: from_email
param.label: Mail From Email
param.description: The email of the feedback message's sender

param.name: name_label
param.label: Name Label
param.description: The label next to the name input.

param.name: email_label
param.label: Email Label
param.description: The label next to the email input.

param.name: phone_label
param.label: Phone Label
param.description: The label next to the phone input.

param.name: subject_label
param.label: Subject Label
param.description: The label next to the subject input.

param.name: message_label
param.label: Message Label
param.description: The label next to the message textarea.

param.name: pre_text
param.default:
Leave us Feedback


Use the form below to provide us feedback.
Thank you
param.label: Form Into Text
param.description: The text displayed before the feedback form. HTML supported

param.name: button_text
param.label: Button Text
param.description: The text displayed on the feedback form's button

param.name: auto_subject
param.label: Auto Subject
param.description: This is an option to automatically retrieve the subject from the article's title

param.name: after_text
param.label: Thank you Text
param.description: The text displayed after submitting feedback

param.name: error_text
param.default: Your feedback could not be submitted. Please try again.
param.label: Error Text
param.description: The text displayed to the user when his feedback fails to be mailed

param.name: invalid_email
param.default: Submitted email is invalid. Please try again.
param.label: Invalid Email Error Message
param.description: The error message when the user submits an invalid email

param.name: exact_url
param.label: Exact URL
param.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. If your site is http and your server/host supports https this should be No.

param.name: disable_https
param.label: Disable HTTPS
param.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. Please enable it if PopFeed posts in https and your site is http.

param.name: fixed_url
param.label: Fixed URL
param.description: A simple solution for people that want to use PopFeed in an exact page. Change this to Yes and write the URL of PopFeed in the Fixed URL Address parameter

param.name: fixed_url_address
param.label: Fixed URL Address
param.description: If fixed url is true, this address is used for PopFeed to post the form.
